A large part of your role as project manager is to manage the triple constraints, being scope, time and costs. Your project sponsor has just informed you that the project you are managing needs to reduce the yearlong schedule by two months. What is your best strategy to meet this change to your project?
options: Consider a reduction in scope or an increase in costs
Recommend a reduction in scope and or a decrease in costs
Understand the request and continue on with the project
